q: Senate Armed Services Committee. Kirsten Gillibrand , recently elected to the seat she was appointed to in 2009, had sought the committee seat. She has worked on military issues like the repeal of the don't ask, don't tell policy for gay troops. And Kirsten Gillibrand had served on the House Armed Services Committee when she represented an upstate New York congressional district.
